Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef APS_RemoveStatus_t APS_RdrStatus_t

This type is deprecated and will be removed.

Definition at line 57 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum APS_RemoveStatus_t

The APS-layer provides services that allow a device (for example, a Trust Center) to inform another device (for example, a router) that one of its children should be removed from the network, or if it wants to remove a router from the network. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.5, page 463 and CCB 1280. Status of creating and sending a remove device command frame.

Definition at line 43 of file apsmeRemoveDevice.h.

Function Documentation

void APS_RemoveDeviceReq ( APS_RemoveDeviceReq_t *  req)

Request to remove a device from the network.

For example, a Trust Center can use this primitive to remove a target device that fails to authenticate properly. See ZigBee Specification r19, 4.4.5.1, page 463.

Parameters:
[in]req- pointer to APSME-REMOVE-DEVICE.request's parameters.
Returns:
None.
void APS_RemoveDeviceInd ( APS_RemoveDeviceInd_t *  ind)

Indication about device removing from the network.

The APSME shall generate this primitive when it receives a remove-device command frame that is successfully decrypted and authenticated, as specified in sub-clause 4.4.1.2 of ZigBee Specification r19.

Parameters:
[in]ind- pointer to APSME-REMOVE-DEVICE.indication's parameters.
Returns:
None.
